title: Why is MVC so important
contents: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
contents: Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas Authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
contents: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!!!
